data.body:
Objective: Enable Direct/Breakdown planning runs to execute through OpenRouter with existing event semantics.

Notes: Depends on waves 1-2 (and UI from wave 3 for operability). Orchestration and breakdown routing tasks can run in parallel.

Assigned tasks:
- Add planner provider selection for Direct and Breakdown
- Implement OpenRouter planning executor with stream normalization
- Integrate provider routing in orchestration manager
- Integrate provider routing in breakdown manager
- Add integration tests for OpenRouter planner sessions

data.title: Scene redmayne-noir: Planner Integration
